name: Loop Back to the Future
description:
You're stuck in a stot car racing loop until you can fill your Flux Capacitor gauge with perfect turns and teleport you to the next level.

Press any button to accelerate. Slow down on the red marks before curves by releasing the button and then accelerate again on the green marks for a Flux Capacitor charge. The better your timing the more gauge it will fill.

F1 to change the camera perspective.

Good luck and have fun!
